snippet: In the latest installment of T’s “What Made Me” video series, the influential art director recalls his Austrian childhood, his “terrible” teenage band and how his interest in album covers led to creating them.
abstract: In the latest installment of T’s “What Made Me” video series, the influential art director recalls his Austrian childhood, his “terrible” teenage band and how his interest in album covers led to creating them.

headline.main: Stefan Sagmeister on How Prog Rock Shaped His Design Career
